Class ServerShop

        public int checkQuantity(Item item)
        Check the quantity of an item in the shop. If needed fulfill an order for the item.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Quantity of item.

        Add a sale for an item.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to sell.
        quantity - Quantity of item to sell.
        Returns:
        true if item was sold, false if there was inefficient quantity.

      • run

        public void run()
        When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

        The general contract of the method run is that it may take any action whatsoever.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Thread.run()
